sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Authentication Core
key_deliverables: VNet/PostGIS Infra; Auth Guard; Local DB Schema
demo_objectives: Show Infrastructure via Terraform; Demonstrate JWT Validation; Show Mobile Local DB
success_criteria: Infrastructure deployed; Auth middleware passing tests; Mobile schema validated
mitigation_strategies: Parallelize Mobile DB work; Use mock auth tokens if B2C delayed

key_deliverables: AKS Cluster; Geo-Routing Service; Mobile Offline Sync
demo_objectives: Demonstrate routing algorithm; Show offline mobile edit & sync
success_criteria: Routing service latency < 100ms; Sync handles conflicts
risk_factors: Sync logic complexity; PostGIS query performance
mitigation_strategies: Extensive unit testing for Sync; Explain Analyze for PostGIS

key_deliverables: Location Permissions; WebSocket Gateway; Signature Pad; Map Component
demo_objectives: Real-time location stream; Admin map editing; Signature capture
success_criteria: Location updates visible; WebSocket stable; Mapbox integration works
